actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965, as amended.

summary.text: Amends the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to increase from $100,000,000 to $180,550,000 the authorization of appropriations for fiscal year 1979 to carry out the special economic development and adjustment assistance program of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965, as amended.
